title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Improving Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Through Academic Library Tutorial Redesign

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners independently explore math problem-solving resources in three or more formats using tutorials designed according to UDL/UDI principles.
Learners solve and present at least two real-world math problems related to their work using academic library digital resources within the project period.
Learners submit final outputs with over 90% completion rates after incorporating peer feedback based on tutorial evaluation rubrics.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
